Description:
1 x Prohibition Notice - PN/RV116032022/08/01 - You have failed to provide suitable and sufficient measures to prevent, so far as is reasonably practicable, persons falling a distance liable to cause serious personal injury, in that, the floor was not fully boarded resulting in gaps big enough for a person to fall through.

1 x Improvement Notice - IN/RV/17032022/08/01 - You have failed to provide suitable and sufficient welfare facilities, as detailed in Schedule 2 of the Construction (Design and Management) Regulations 2015 (Minimum Welfare Facilities on Construction Sites), including a supply of hot and cold, or warm, running water in the immediate vicinity of a toilet.
